00025 bool getbit(const base_integer& n, size_t bit) {
00026     size_t index = bit / bits_per_digit;
00027     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00028         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00029         return ((n._get_digit(index) & mask) != 0);
00030     } else return false;
00031 }
00032 
00033 void setbit(base_integer& n, size_t bit) {
00034     if (n._is_fixed() && bit >= n._fixed_bits()) return;
00035 
00036     n._make_unique();
00037 
00038     size_t index = bit / bits_per_digit;
00039     if (index >= n._get_length()) n._realloc(index+1);
00040 
00041     digit_t mask = (digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00042     n._get_writable_digits()[index] |= mask;
00043     n._cleanup();
00044 }
00045 
00046 void clearbit(base_integer& n, size_t bit) {
00047     if (n._is_fixed() && bit >= n._fixed_bits()) return;
00048 
00049     size_t index = bit / bits_per_digit;
00050     if (index < n._get_length()) {
00051         n._make_unique();
00052         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit % bits_per_digit));
00053         n._get_writable_digits()[index] &= ~mask;
00054         n._cleanup();
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 size_t lowestbit(const base_integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00059     if (n._is_zero()) return valueIfZero;
00060 
00061     const digit_t *p=n._get_digits(), *pe=p+n._get_length();
00062     while (p!=pe && *p==0) ++p;
00063 
00064     size_t index=(p - n._get_digits());
00065     size_t r=(bits_per_digit * index);
00066     digit_t digit=*p;
00067 
00068     while ((digit & 0x01)==0) {
00069         digit>>=1;
00070         ++r;
00071     }
00072 
00073     return r;
00074 }
00075 
00076 size_t highestbit(const base_integer& n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00077     return (n._is_zero() ? valueIfZero : n._log2()-1);
00078 }
00079 
00080 void bitwise_and(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const
00081     base_integer& n2)
00082 {
00083     bool n1larger=(n1._get_length() > n2._get_length());
00084     const base_integer &smaller(n1larger ? n2 : n1),
00085         &larger(n1larger ? n1 : n2);
00086 
00087     size_t maxlen = (std::min)(smaller._get_length(), target._get_max_length());
00088 
00089     target._make_unique();
00090     target._realloc(maxlen);
00091 
00092     const digit_t *s1 = smaller._get_digits(), *s1e = s1 + maxlen, *s2 =
00093         larger._get_digits();
00094     digit_t *t = target._get_writable_digits();
00095 
00096     while (s1 < s1e) *t++ = *s1++ & *s2++;
00097 
00098     target._cleanup();
00099 }
00100 
00101 void bitwise_or(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const
00102     base_integer& n2)
00103 {
00104     bool n1larger = (n1._get_length() > n2._get_length());
00105     const base_integer &smaller(n1larger ? n2 : n1), &larger(n1larger ? n1 : n2);
00106 
00107     size_t maxlen = (std::min)(larger._get_length(), target._get_max_length());
00108 
00109     target._make_unique();
00110     target._realloc(maxlen);
00111 
00112     const digit_t *s1 = smaller._get_digits(), *s1e = s1 +
00113         (std::min)(smaller._get_length(), maxlen);
00114     const digit_t *s2 = larger._get_digits(), *s2e = s2 + maxlen;
00115     digit_t *t = target._get_writable_digits();
00116 
00117     while (s1 < s1e) *t++ = *s1++ | *s2++;
00118     while (s2 < s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00119 
00120     target._cleanup();
00121 }
00122 
00123 void bitwise_xor(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n1, const
00124     base_integer& n2)
00125 {
00126     bool n1larger=(n1._get_length() > n2._get_length());
00127     const base_integer &smaller(n1larger ? n2 : n1), &larger(n1larger ? n1 : n2);
00128 
00129     size_t maxlen = (std::min)(larger._get_length(), target._get_max_length());
00130 
00131     target._make_unique();
00132     target._realloc(maxlen);
00133 
00134     const digit_t *s1 = smaller._get_digits(), *s1e = s1 +
00135         (std::min)(smaller._get_length(), maxlen);
00136     const digit_t *s2 = larger._get_digits(), *s2e = s2 + maxlen;
00137     digit_t *t = target._get_writable_digits();
00138 
00139     while (s1<s1e) *t++ = *s1++ ^ *s2++;
00140     while (s2<s2e) *t++ = *s2++;
00141 
00142     target._cleanup();
00143 }
00144 
00145 void shift_left(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00146     if (byBits==0) {
00147         target._attach(n);
00148         return;
00149     }
00150 
00151     size_t bytes = byBits / bits_per_digit, bits = byBits % bits_per_digit;
00152     size_t nlen = n._get_length();
00153 
00154     temp_t answer(target, n._get_length() + bytes + 1);
00155     digit_t *tgt = answer._get_writable_digits();
00156     size_t anslen = answer._get_max_length();
00157 
00158     const digit_t *src = n._get_digits();
00159 
00160     // bits/bytes is distance to move
00161     // nlen is one greater than top source byte to move
00162     nlen = (std::min)(nlen, anslen - bytes - (bits != 0 ? 1 : 0));
00163 
00164     if (bits != 0 && bytes+1 < anslen) {
00165         // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00166         const digit_t *s = src + nlen - 1;
00167         digit_t *t = tgt + nlen + bytes;
00168 
00169         *t-- = *s >> (bits_per_digit - bits);
00170         while (s > src) {
00171             *t = (*s-- << bits);
00172             *t-- |= (*s >> (bits_per_digit - bits));
00173         }
00174         *t = (*s << bits);
00175     } else if (bytes != 0 && bytes+1 < anslen) {
00176         memcpy(tgt + bytes, src, sizeof(digit_t) * nlen);
00177     }
00178     answer._cleanup();
00179     answer._set_negative(n._get_negative());
00180     target._attach(answer);
00181 }
00182 
00183 void shift_right(base_integer& target, const base_integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00184     if (byBits==0) {
00185         target._attach(n);
00186         return;
00187     }
00188 
00189     size_t bytes = byBits / bits_per_digit, bits = byBits % bits_per_digit,
00190         bits2 = bits_per_digit - bits;
00191 
00192     temp_t answer(target, n._get_length() + bytes + 1);
00193     digit_t *tgt = answer._get_writable_digits();
00194 
00195     size_t nlen = n._get_length();
00196     const digit_t *src = n._get_digits();
00197     if (bytes < nlen) {
00198         if (bits != 0) {
00199             // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00200             const digit_t *s = src + bytes, *se = src + nlen - 1;
00201             digit_t *t = tgt;
00202             while (s!=se) {
00203                 *t = (*s++ >> bits);
00204                 *t++ |= (*s << bits2);
00205             }
00206             *t = (*s >> bits);
00207         } else if (bytes != 0) {
00208             memcpy(tgt, src + bytes, sizeof(digit_t) * (nlen - bytes));
00209         }
00210     }
00211     answer._cleanup();
00212     answer._set_negative(n._get_negative());
00213     target._attach(answer);
00214 }

00297 integer bitwise_and(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {
00298     integer r;
00299     detail::bitwise_and(r, n1, n2);
00300     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00301 }

00327 integer bitwise_xor(const integer& n1, const integer& n2) {

00332 
00343 integer shift(const integer& n, int byBits) {
00344     if (byBits > 0) return shift_left(n, byBits);
00345     else return shift_right(n, -byBits);
00346 }
00347 
00357 integer shift_left(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00358     integer r;
00359     detail::shift_left(r, n, byBits);
00360     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00361 }

00372 integer shift_right(const integer& n, size_t byBits) {
00373     integer r;
00374     detail::shift_right(r, n, byBits);
00375     return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
